trans-unit.source: Represents a collection of <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ListSortDescription"></xref> objects.
trans-unit.target: Representerer en samling av <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ListSortDescription"> </xref> objekter.

trans-unit.source: The ListSortDescriptionCollection class is used by the <xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingListView> interface.
trans-unit.target: Klassen ListSortDescriptionCollection brukes av den <xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingListView>grensesnittet.</xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingListView>

trans-unit.source: The ListSortDescriptionCollection is read-only once constructed.
trans-unit.target: ListSortDescriptionCollection er skrivebeskyttet konstruert én gang.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ListSortDescriptionCollection"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ListSortDescriptionCollection"> </xref> klasse.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ComponentModel.ListSortDescriptionCollection> is read-only once constructed.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.ComponentModel.ListSortDescriptionCollection>er skrivebeskyttet konstruert én gang.</xref:System.ComponentModel.ListSortDescriptionCollection>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ListSortDescriptionCollection"></xref> class with the specified array of <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ListSortDescription"></xref> objects.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ListSortDescriptionCollection"> </xref> klassen med den angitte matrisen for <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ListSortDescription"> </xref> objekter.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ComponentModel.ListSortDescriptionCollection> is read-only once constructed.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.ComponentModel.ListSortDescriptionCollection>er skrivebeskyttet konstruert én gang.</xref:System.ComponentModel.ListSortDescriptionCollection>

trans-unit.source: Example
trans-unit.target: Eksempel:

trans-unit.source: The array of <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ListSortDescription"></xref> objects to be contained in the collection.
trans-unit.target: En rekke <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ListSortDescription"> </xref> som skal finnes i samlingen.

trans-unit.source: Determines if the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ListSortDescriptionCollection"></xref> contains a specific value.
trans-unit.target: Bestemmer om den <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ListSortDescriptionCollection"> </xref> inneholder en bestemt verdi.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Object> to locate in the collection.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Object>ikke i samlingen.</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref:System.Object> is found in the collection; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis den <xref:System.Object>er funnet i samlingen; ellers, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: Copies the contents of the collection to the specified array, starting at the specified destination array index.
trans-unit.target: Kopier innholdet i samlingen til den angitte matrisen som starter ved matriseindeksen angitt mål.

trans-unit.source: The destination array for the items copied from the collection.
trans-unit.target: Målmatrisen for elementene kopieres fra samlingen.

trans-unit.source: The index of the destination array at which copying begins.
trans-unit.target: Indeksen for Målmatrisen ved som kopiering starter.

trans-unit.source: Gets the number of items in the collection.
trans-unit.target: Henter antallet elementer i samlingen.

trans-unit.source: The number of items in the collection.
trans-unit.target: Antall elementer i samlingen.

trans-unit.source: Returns the index of the specified item in the collection.
trans-unit.target: Returnerer indeksen for det angitte elementet i samlingen.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Object> to locate in the collection.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Object>ikke i samlingen.</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: The index of value if found in the list; otherwise, -1.
trans-unit.target: Indeksen for value Hvis funnet i listen; ellers, -1.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the specified <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ListSortDescription"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir den angitte <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ListSortDescription"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ComponentModel.ListSortDescriptionCollection> is read-only once constructed and will throw an <xref:System.InvalidOperationException> if you attempt to set an item.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.ComponentModel.ListSortDescriptionCollection>er skrivebeskyttet konstruert én gang, og vil iverksette en <xref:System.InvalidOperationException>Hvis du prøver å angi et element.</xref:System.InvalidOperationException> </xref:System.ComponentModel.ListSortDescriptionCollection>

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index of the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ListSortDescription"></xref> to get or set in the collection.
trans-unit.target: Den nullbaserte indeksen for den <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ListSortDescription"> </xref> ikke hente eller angi i samlingen.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ListSortDescription"></xref> with the specified index.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ListSortDescription"> </xref> med den angitte indeksen.

trans-unit.source: An item is set in the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ListSortDescriptionCollection"></xref>, which is read-only.
trans-unit.target: Et element som er angitt i den <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ListSortDescriptionCollection"> </xref>, som er skrivebeskyttet.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether access to the collection is thread safe.
trans-unit.target: Henter en verdi som angir om tilgang til samlingen er tråd trygt.

trans-unit.source: This property always returns `true`, because once constructed, the collection is read-only.
trans-unit.target: Denne egenskapen returnerer alltid `true`fordi når konstruert, samlingen er skrivebeskyttet.

trans-unit.source: This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: Dette medlemmet er implementering eksplisitt grensesnitt medlem.

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.ComponentModel.ListSortDescriptionCollection> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Collections.ICollection> interface.
trans-unit.target: Den kan brukes bare når den <xref:System.ComponentModel.ListSortDescriptionCollection>forekomsten endres til en <xref:System.Collections.ICollection>grensesnittet.</xref:System.Collections.ICollection> </xref:System.ComponentModel.ListSortDescriptionCollection>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true " name="true " href=""></xref>in all cases.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true " name="true " href=""></xref>i alle tilfeller.

trans-unit.source: Gets the current instance that can be used to synchronize access to the collection.
trans-unit.target: Henter den gjeldende forekomsten som kan brukes til å synkronisere tilgang til samlingen.

trans-unit.source: This implementation returns the current instance of the <xref:System.ComponentModel.ListSortDescriptionCollection>, because this collection, once constructed, does not allow public access to the underlying list.
trans-unit.target: Returnerer den gjeldende forekomsten av for denne implementeringen av <xref:System.ComponentModel.ListSortDescriptionCollection>fordi samlingen, når konstruert, ikke tillater offentlig tilgang til den underliggende listen.</xref:System.ComponentModel.ListSortDescriptionCollection>

trans-unit.source: For more information on the ICollection.SyncRoot method, see the <xref:System.Collections.ICollection.SyncRoot%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property.
trans-unit.target: For mer informasjon om ICollection.SyncRoot-metoden, kan du se den <xref:System.Collections.ICollection.SyncRoot%2A?displayProperty=fullName>egenskapen.</xref:System.Collections.ICollection.SyncRoot%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The current instance of the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ListSortDescriptionCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Den gjeldende forekomsten av den <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ListSortDescriptionCollection"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets a <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator?displayProperty=fullName> that can be used to iterate through the collection.
trans-unit.target: Henter en <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator?displayProperty=fullName> som kan brukes til å gå gjennom samlingen.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator> that can be used to iterate through the collection.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator>som kan brukes til å gå gjennom samlingen.</xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator>

trans-unit.source: Adds an item to the collection.
trans-unit.target: Legger til et element i samlingen.

trans-unit.source: Because the <xref:System.ComponentModel.ListSortDescriptionCollection> class implements the <xref:System.Collections.IList?displayProperty=fullName> interface, it must have an IList.Add method.
trans-unit.target: Fordi den <xref:System.ComponentModel.ListSortDescriptionCollection>klasse implementerer den <xref:System.Collections.IList?displayProperty=fullName>grensesnittet må ha en IList.Add-metode.</xref:System.Collections.IList?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.ComponentModel.ListSortDescriptionCollection>

trans-unit.source: However, because the <xref:System.ComponentModel.ListSortDescriptionCollection> class represents a read-only collection, adding items to the collection is an invalid operation.
trans-unit.target: Imidlertid fordi den <xref:System.ComponentModel.ListSortDescriptionCollection>klassen representerer en skrivebeskyttet samling, legge til elementer i samlingen er en ugyldig operasjon.</xref:System.ComponentModel.ListSortDescriptionCollection>

trans-unit.source: The item to add to the collection.
trans-unit.target: Elementet du vil legge til i samlingen.

trans-unit.source: The position into which the new element was inserted.
trans-unit.target: Plasser det nye objektet ble satt inn.

trans-unit.source: In all cases.
trans-unit.target: I alle tilfeller.

trans-unit.source: Removes all items from the collection.
trans-unit.target: Fjerner alle elementer fra samlingen.

trans-unit.source: Because the <xref:System.ComponentModel.ListSortDescriptionCollection> class implements the <xref:System.Collections.IList?displayProperty=fullName> interface, it must have a IList.Clear method.
trans-unit.target: Fordi den <xref:System.ComponentModel.ListSortDescriptionCollection>klasse implementerer den <xref:System.Collections.IList?displayProperty=fullName>grensesnittet må ha en IList.Clear-metode.</xref:System.Collections.IList?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.ComponentModel.ListSortDescriptionCollection>

trans-unit.source: However, because the <xref:System.ComponentModel.ListSortDescriptionCollection> class represents a read-only collection, clearing items from the collection is an invalid operation.
trans-unit.target: Imidlertid fordi den <xref:System.ComponentModel.ListSortDescriptionCollection>klassen representerer en samling som skrivebeskyttet, sletter elementer fra samlingen er en ugyldig operasjon.</xref:System.ComponentModel.ListSortDescriptionCollection>

trans-unit.source: In all cases.
trans-unit.target: I alle tilfeller.

trans-unit.source: Inserts an item into the collection at a specified index.
trans-unit.target: Setter inn et element i samlingen ved en angitt indeks.

trans-unit.source: Because the <xref:System.ComponentModel.ListSortDescriptionCollection> class implements the <xref:System.Collections.IList?displayProperty=fullName> interface, it must have a IList.Insert method.
trans-unit.target: Fordi den <xref:System.ComponentModel.ListSortDescriptionCollection>klasse implementerer den <xref:System.Collections.IList?displayProperty=fullName>grensesnittet må ha en IList.Insert-metode.</xref:System.Collections.IList?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.ComponentModel.ListSortDescriptionCollection>

trans-unit.source: However, because the <xref:System.ComponentModel.ListSortDescriptionCollection> class represents a read-only collection, inserting items into the collection is an invalid operation.
trans-unit.target: Imidlertid fordi den <xref:System.ComponentModel.ListSortDescriptionCollection>klassen representerer en skrivebeskyttet samling, innsetting av elementer i samlingen er en ugyldig operasjon.</xref:System.ComponentModel.ListSortDescriptionCollection>

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index of the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ListSortDescription"></xref> to get or set in the collection
trans-unit.target: Den nullbaserte indeksen for den <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ListSortDescription"> </xref> ikke hente eller angi i samlingen

trans-unit.source: The item to insert into the collection.
trans-unit.target: Element som skal settes inn i samlingen.

trans-unit.source: In all cases.
trans-unit.target: I alle tilfeller.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the collection has a fixed size.
trans-unit.target: Henter en verdi som angir om samlingen har en fast størrelse.

trans-unit.source: The collection is read-only once constructed and will, therefore, always have a fixed size.
trans-unit.target: Samlingen er skrivebeskyttet når konstruert og, derfor alltid har en fast størrelse.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> in all cases.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>i alle tilfeller.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the collection is read-only.
trans-unit.target: Henter en verdi som angir om samlingen er skrivebeskyttet.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ComponentModel.ListSortDescriptionCollection> is read-only once constructed.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.ComponentModel.ListSortDescriptionCollection>er skrivebeskyttet konstruert én gang.</xref:System.ComponentModel.ListSortDescriptionCollection>

trans-unit.source: A collection that is read-only does not allow the addition, removal, or modification of elements after the collection is created.
trans-unit.target: En samling som er skrivebeskyttet tillater ikke tillegg, fjerning eller endring av elementene etter at samlingen er opprettet.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true " name="true " href=""></xref>in all cases.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true " name="true " href=""></xref>i alle tilfeller.

trans-unit.source: Gets the specified <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ListSortDescription"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Henter den angitte <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ListSortDescription"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index of the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ListSortDescription"></xref> to get in the collection
trans-unit.target: Den nullbaserte indeksen for den <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ListSortDescription"> </xref> å hente i samlingen

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ListSortDescription"></xref> with the specified index.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ListSortDescription"> </xref> med den angitte indeksen.

trans-unit.source: Removes the first occurrence of an item from the collection.
trans-unit.target: Fjerner den første forekomsten av et element fra samlingen.

trans-unit.source: Because the <xref:System.ComponentModel.ListSortDescriptionCollection> class implements the <xref:System.Collections.IList?displayProperty=fullName> interface, it must have a IList.Remove method.
trans-unit.target: Fordi den <xref:System.ComponentModel.ListSortDescriptionCollection>klasse implementerer den <xref:System.Collections.IList?displayProperty=fullName>grensesnittet må ha en IList.Remove-metode.</xref:System.Collections.IList?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.ComponentModel.ListSortDescriptionCollection>

trans-unit.source: However, because the <xref:System.ComponentModel.ListSortDescriptionCollection> class represents a read-only collection, removing items from the collection is an invalid operation.
trans-unit.target: Imidlertid fordi den <xref:System.ComponentModel.ListSortDescriptionCollection>klassen representerer en skrivebeskyttet samling, fjerner elementer fra samlingen er en ugyldig operasjon.</xref:System.ComponentModel.ListSortDescriptionCollection>

trans-unit.source: The item to remove from the collection.
trans-unit.target: Elementet som skal fjernes fra samlingen.

trans-unit.source: In all cases.
trans-unit.target: I alle tilfeller.

trans-unit.source: Removes an item from the collection at a specified index.
trans-unit.target: Fjerner et element fra samlingen ved en angitt indeks.

trans-unit.source: Because the <xref:System.ComponentModel.ListSortDescriptionCollection> class implements the <xref:System.Collections.IList?displayProperty=fullName> interface, it must have a IList.RemoveAt method.
trans-unit.target: Fordi den <xref:System.ComponentModel.ListSortDescriptionCollection>klasse implementerer den <xref:System.Collections.IList?displayProperty=fullName>grensesnittet må ha en IList.RemoveAt-metode.</xref:System.Collections.IList?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.ComponentModel.ListSortDescriptionCollection>

trans-unit.source: However, because the <xref:System.ComponentModel.ListSortDescriptionCollection> class represents a read-only collection, removing items from the collection is an invalid operation.
trans-unit.target: Imidlertid fordi den <xref:System.ComponentModel.ListSortDescriptionCollection>klassen representerer en skrivebeskyttet samling, fjerner elementer fra samlingen er en ugyldig operasjon.</xref:System.ComponentModel.ListSortDescriptionCollection>

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index of the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ListSortDescription"></xref> to remove from the collection
trans-unit.target: Den nullbaserte indeksen for den <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ListSortDescription"> </xref> skal fjernes fra samlingen

trans-unit.source: In all cases.
trans-unit.target: I alle tilfeller.
